entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:30 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 8:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near Bowen Island. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:31 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain changing to freezing rain at times heavy late in the morning then to rain at times heavy late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near Bowen Island in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:31 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight except gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:31 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
